description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Tear a swatch of destruction through space in this action-packed shooter.  Aim carefully with the targeting reticule as each successful shot charges the special weapons faster: each of which can turn the tide of battle as you blow your enemies to pieces.
